p: We applied an egocentric approach (Hanneman and Riddle 2011; Marin and Wellman 2011) to capture the baseline network (Step 1). The network is mapped around a particular node, known as an ego, which in our case is Orbili village (Fig.Â 2). We developed a detailed interaction protocol to capture primary relational data of the actors. In particular the interaction protocol captured four main aspects of actor relations, namely length, frequency, type, and usefulness. 2
